options.text: Asana for task management and communication
options.why: Known for project tracking, but lacks integration with creative tools
assumptions: Teams value task tracking over real-time chat

options.text: Microsoft Teams for integrated chat and video
options.why: Combines messaging and meetings, but not creative-focused

options.text: Google Docs for collaborative brainstorming in 20-50p teams
options.why: Offers real-time collaboration but lacks task management
